name: sk
readme:
Spice Kit is a set of classes / utilities used by most Spice App projects. The folder structure is ordered as such:

/sk/[PLATFORM]/...
/sk/core/... <- code which can be used by any platform
/sk/web/... <- web specific code
/sk/node/... <- node.js specific code
/sk/titanium/... <- titanium specific code
